entries.name: Flight
entries: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. You do not require much space to maneuver due to your small and agile wings.

entries.name: Sixth Sense
entries: When near danger, your wings vibrate faintly, warning you of harm. This functions as a passive sense for environmental threats.

entries.name: Zen Direction
entries: Your movement is guided by nature. When left to instinct, you may be drawn toward beneficial or relevant locations, even if unintentionally.

entries.name: Subrace: Blessed Asrai
entries: You have a deeper link to nature. You gain Rank 1 in Dynamic Power (Nature), allowing basic control over natural surroundings.
